body: Instead of proficiency with all firearms, a musket master only gains proficiency with two-handed firearms. She must take the Exotic Weapon Proficiency (firearm) feat to gain proficiency with one-handed firearms and firearm siege engines.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Gunslinger/Gunslinger Archetypes/Musket Master/Weapon Proficiency
name: Weapon Proficiency
